name: 風船少女テンプルちゃん

staff.value: 高橋由美子 / 谷田部雄次

story: Temple is a lovely little girl who is more fond of music than anything else. She happens to board a balloon one day, and is excited by her aerial journey until she finds herself drifting away from her parents and home. She is in tears until she meets a drummer boy accompanied by animal friends who also play musical instruments. Joined by these new friends who play music to keep up her spirits, Temple sets out to find her way home.
